subcompartment.name: unspecified
subcompartment.comment: Only used if no specific information available.

subcompartment.name: forestry
subcompartment.comment: Emission to soil that is used for plant production (wood, renewable raw materials), but which is not used or suitable for production of agricultural products that enter the human food chain (permanent forest land, marginal lands). Forestry.

subcompartment.name: agricultural
subcompartment.comment: Emission to soil that is used for or is suitable for the production of agricultural products that enter the human food chain. Agriculture, agricultural biomass production.

subcompartment.name: industrial
subcompartment.comment: Emission to soil used for industry, manufacturing, waste management and infrastructure. Industry, landfarming of wastes, built-up land.

subcompartment.name: biotic
subcompartment.comment: Biogenic resource, e.g. wood

subcompartment.name: in air
subcompartment.comment: Natural resources in air, e.g. argon, carbon dioxide. Used for carbon uptake in biomass and gases produced by air separation.

subcompartment.name: in ground
subcompartment.comment: Natural resource in soil e.g. ores; landfill volume.

subcompartment.name: in water
subcompartment.comment: Natural resource in water, e.g. magnesium, water.

subcompartment.name: fossil well
subcompartment.comment: Resource that infiltrated usually millennia ago, often under climatic conditions different from the present, and have been stored in deep underground since.

subcompartment.name: land
subcompartment.comment: Land occupation and transformation.

subcompartment.name: primary production factor
subcompartment.comment: Labour cost, net tax, net operating surplus, rent. All net expenditures except those paid for goods and services purchased

subcompartment.name: non-urban air or from high stacks
subcompartment.comment: Emission in areas with a population density below 400 persons per km2 or from stacks higher than 100 m. Resource extraction, forestry, agriculture, hydro energy, wind power, coal and nu-clear power plants, municipal landfills, wastewater treatment, long-distance transports, shipping.

subcompartment.name: urban air close to ground
subcompartment.comment: Emission below 100 metres in areas with a population density above 400 persons per km2. Industry, oil and gas power plants, manufacturing, households, municipal waste incineration, local traffic, construction activities.

subcompartment.name: low population density, long-term
subcompartment.comment: Emission which take place in the future, >100 years after the start of the activity. Emissions from uranium mill tailings

subcompartment.name: indoor
subcompartment.comment: Emission inside closed buildings and outside of dedicated fume hoods with intake speed > 0,5 m/s. Use stage of products for indoor use

subcompartment.name: lower stratosphere + upper troposphere
subcompartment.comment: Emissions from airplanes. Air transport, cruising.

subcompartment.name: unspecified
subcompartment.comment: Only used if no specific information available.

compartment.name: inventory indicator
compartment.comment: Life Cycle Inventory-based indicator. The indicator can be used in Environmental Product Declarations compliant with EN15804, ISO21930 and ISO14025

subcompartment.name: waste
subcompartment.comment: Flow describing waste categories, e.g. hazardous waste disposed, non-hazardous waste disposed

subcompartment.name: resource use
subcompartment.comment: LCI based flow describing the use of renewable and non renewable material and energy resources

subcompartment.name: output flow
subcompartment.comment: Output flow derived from LCI, e.g. materials for recycling, materials for energy recovery

subcompartment.name: unspecified
subcompartment.comment: Contamination in products used for oral intake or with skin contact. Food products and medicine at the point of human intake, hygiene products and clothing at the use stage.

subcompartment.name: unspecified
subcompartment.comment: Changes in social conditions. All externalities affecting human welfare and/or productivity, not elsewhere covered.

subcompartment.name: fossil well
subcompartment.comment: Emissions to deep underground wells, normally in the context of fossil fuel extraction.

subcompartment.name: surface water
subcompartment.comment: Rivers and lakes. Discharge of effluents from wastewater treatment facilities.

subcompartment.name: ocean
subcompartment.comment: Ocean, sea and salty lakes. Offshore works, overseas ship transports.

subcompartment.name: ground-, long-term
subcompartment.comment: Emissions which take place in the future, 100 years after the start of the activity. Long-term emissions from landfills.

subcompartment.name: unspecified
subcompartment.comment: Only used if no specific information available.

subcompartment.name: ground-
subcompartment.comment: Ground water which will get in contact with the biosphere after some time.
